name: Bottle Puzzle
description: An engine for a puzzle game in which players have to get the same coloured liquid into the same bottle.

name: Traffic Overview
description: An unofficial rewrite of National Highways' Traffic England service - including additional functionality.

name: Snakes & Ladders
description: A game engine for the well-known board game Snakes & Ladders.

name: Battle Game
description: My solution for the final project of the Digital People course: a Pokemon-style fighting game.

name: Course Unit Reviews
description: A platform for Computer Science students at the University of Manchester to review course units.

name: Pressure
description: A game which requires players to touch pressure plates in a maze at regular intervals.

name: Higher or Lower?
description: A higher and lower cards game which gives you all the statistics you need to make an informed decision.

name: Tanzania Blog
description: A showcase of my build up to and my time in Tanzania - including photos.

name: Redirects
description: A link redirects system developed for my own personal use.
